attributes.action: Do not limit trial by jury to serious crimes only.
attributes.additional_details: Jury trial is a fundamental and historically long standing  British  legal right.
attributes.background: To guarantee the existing provision for trial by jury.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
